Bianca Xunise bụ onye America na-ese ihe osise, onye na-ese ihe osise, na onye na-akọwa onwe ya dịka "goth of color"
A na-ejikọta ọrụ ya na mba site na Six Chix comic strip collaborative.

A mụrụ Xunise na Chicago nye nne na nna bu ndi nka; nne ya bụ onye na-emepụta ejiji. Ezinụlọ ya nwere mgbọrọgwụ Creole. Ọ malitere dị ka onye na-ede blọgụ ejiji, mana ọ kwụsịrị "n'ihi na ha achọghị ịgba George Zimmerman ebubo na ikpe Trayvon Martin ma mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, achọpụtara m na m enweghị m mmasị iche banyere ihe m na-eyi ọzọ

Mmetụta Xunise gụnyere onye na-ese ihe na Finland bụ Tove Jansson, onye na-ese akwụkwọ ụmụaka nke Austria bụ Ludwig Bemelmans, na onye na-ese manga na Japan bụ Naoko Takeuchi. O kwuru na mmalite ọkachamara ya na ihe nkiri na obodo ntanetị maka ụmụ nwanyị Hello Giggles, nke nyere ya kọlụm na 2015. E gosipụtara Xunise na Nib na Shondaland mgbe King Features Syndicate gwara ya ka o mepụta ihe ngosi ụtụ Popeye. N'afọ 2018, o ritere Ignatz Award maka "Promising New Talent" maka "Say Her Name" nke o bipụtara n'onwe ya, nke na-ekwu maka nchegbu nke ịbụ onye ojii na America.

N'afọ 2020, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị ojii nke abụọ na-enye aka na ihe nkiri mba, mgbe ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime Six Chix. Barbara Brandon-Croft bu ya ụzọ n'ihe dị iche a, onye ihe nkiri ya kwa ụbọchị bụ Where I'm Coming From bụ nke a na-ejikọta na mba site na 1991 ruo 2005
Site na mbido Six Chix ya, Xunise ghọkwara onye mbụ Black nonbinary cartoonist nke a na-ejikọta na mba.
